fields.summary: add acid version marker to acid files/directories

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.body: Seems it doesn't print hive.acid.version into {{_orc_acid_version}} file too. I can take this JIRA.

Go ahead and take it if you want.  The issue is not during writing - if you use API to read the footer of the orc file, the info is there.  The issue is that orcfiledump only prints text data and I made this field binary for some reason.  You can look at OrcRecordUpdater.KeyIndexBuilder for example and UTF8 encode version info in the same fashion - this should make it visible in orcfiledump

Okay. I've already fixed it locally. But workaround in OrcRecordUpdater is more correct. I will do it in the same way.
Thanks for the hint.
